entry.title: Russian Withdrawal Brings More Shelling in Southern Ukrainian Town
entry.content: Ukrainian troops repelled the Russians from the edge of Orikhiv after long-range weapon systems arrived on Ukraine’s southern front two months ago. But for the city’s residents, life has got harder.

entry.title: Explosions Hit Russian Ammunition Depot in Crimea
entry.content: Russian officials reported explosions at an ammunition depot in Crimea, prompting the suspension of trains and marking a fresh blow to Moscow’s war effort.

entry.title: Hundreds of Somali-American Youths Held Captive in Rehab Centers; 'They Were Torturing Me'
entry.content: Immigrant parents send children back to East Africa to receive “treatment” for addiction, being gay or just acting too Westernized.
